author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

Catched by the static analyzer.

Avoid the possible dereference of a null pointer in RecoTauVertexAssociator::getLeadCand.
Taken also the opportunity to replace a call to a TMath function with the corresponding std one.

#### PR validation:

It builds.
No changes are expected


@mbluj @swozniewski
title: Avoid dereferencing a null pointer in RecoTauVertexAssociator
